Name: Leaf

Skin.Texture: Like a Sapling: Smooth, Hard, Flexible

Summary: Leaf is a helpful, polite plant girl who likes books and organization. She is an expert in deterministic algorithms, especially data structures and graphs.

Powers.Description: Allows Leaf to manipulate plants. She can tell plants to bend with her mind and they will do it.
Leaf is friends with the wind. When she wishes hard for a breeze, the wind will blow. If she holds a large leaf in the air, the wind will blow her where she needs to go.

Powers.Biography: Leaf is the librarian of the stem forest library. She helps people find books in the library and helps people organize. She organizes all sorts of events at the library too.
